title: @KateyKhaos: Question about Darius...
body:
Does he have a manly hairy chest? If so, you might as well rename him to Gaston

 No. one. fights like Gaston.
No one sliced like Gaston.
No one gets first blood, quite like Gastooooon.
If you feed him in lane, he'll be a paaaaaaaaaaaain
No one is quite like Gastoooooon!

No. one. first picks like Gaston
or last hits like Gaston
No one makes noobs ragequit, quite like Gastoooooon. 
When put to the test,
I think hes the beeeest
No one is quite like Gastoooooon!

{{champion:122}} 

I loooooooove ~~Darius~~ Gaston!
